mapper.sql: appTypeID, appTypeName, sortNum, isCurrent, isDelete, theNote
mapper.select:
select a.appTypeID, a.appTypeName, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_apptype a
a.isDelete=1
and a.appTypeName like '%${appTypeName}%'
order by a.sortNum asc
select a.appTypeID, a.appTypeName, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_apptype a where a.isDelete=1 and a.appTypeID = #{appTypeID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
